text: "Hold My Hand" is a song performed by American singers Michael Jackson and Akon, from Jackson's first posthumous album Michael (2010). It was recorded in December 2007 at the Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas, Nevada. It was released posthumously on November 15, 2010, a year after Jackson's untimely death. It reached ten in the UK Singles Chart. ==References== Category:2010 songs Category:Akon songs Category:Michael Jackson songs
title: Hold My Hand (Michael Jackson and Akon song)
